SummaryEnglish: The story focuses on Yui, a girl who lives in the town of Paparajuku, and who dreams of being an idol, even if she realizes that being an idol is next to impossible for her. Her friends often remark on how much she dreams about it. But then, the PriPara idol theme park opens in her town, and that an idol named Laala is coming to town from Parajuku, which only makes Yui dream even bigger. The new PriPara theme park has been updated with new concepts. However, due to a system error, Laala is no longer able to PriPara Change.

1.SummaryEnglish: Yui Yumekawa, a girl who dreams of becoming an idol finally gets her chance when she obtains her PriTicket and a PriPara opens up in Paparajuku. But in a town where idoling is only for boys, will she stand a chance?

2.SummaryEnglish: After being punished for trying to become an idol, a discouraged Yui is forced to work after school. Meanwhile, Laala tries to find a hidden route to PriPara with the help of some fellow students.

3.SummaryEnglish: To improve as an idol, Yui is tasked with performing a brand new Making Drama for her next performance. But when she continuously enters Delusion Time it's up to Laala to get her to focus.

4.TitleEnglish: Nice to See You! It's Mirei!
4.SummaryEnglish: Laala attempts to trick Mirei after she decides to pay Paparajuku a visit to see how the PriPara is. After Mirei quickly foils the girls plot, she decides to lend them a hand enlisting new idols.

5.SummaryEnglish: To cover his recent change in career, Kuma is requested by Laala and Yui to teach Punicorn the proper ways of a manager.

6.TitleEnglish: Dream Dream!? Infiltrating to the DanPri!
6.SummaryEnglish: In hopes of discovering what makes DanPri so popular, Yui and Laala join the Sheep Squad to sneak into it and find out what makes it so popular.

7.SummaryEnglish: Laala and Yui host a program in PriPara to raise attention to it. But after their special guest, Sophy fails to arrive it's up to Yui to locate her while Laala tries to buy time.

8.SummaryEnglish: After Nino Nijiiro takes idols lightly and refuses to join PriPara, Laala and Yui take it amongst themselves to prove to her that idols have just as much passion as anyone else.

9.TitleEnglish: Grand Opening of the Fashion Studio
9.SummaryEnglish: While trying to convince more girls to join PriPara, they are caught off guard by Chiako, one of the Avocado Academy cheerleaders, as she plays with their hair. With that they encourage her to join PriPara to open her own FaSion Store but she is soon torn between her obligations as a Sheep Squad member and following her dreams.

10.TitleEnglish: Yo, I Became a Helper Idol!
10.SummaryEnglish: With a big event going on in the shopping district, Laala and Yui continue to scout idols for PriPara, along with Nino, who they still refuse to give up on. Despite her earlier refusals, Nino finds herself reconsidering after she is met by a tougher foe.

11.TitleEnglish: Throw it! Idol Time Grand Prix
11.SummaryEnglish: While SoLaMi Smile is doing the opening show for the Grand Prix, Mimiko decides the Disciplinary committee will play against Nino's baseball team to keep her from getting to PriPara. As this is going on Yui attempts to lend a hand as Sion returns.

12.TitleEnglish: Hit it! Idol Time Grand Prix

17.TitleEnglish: Yo, It's An Idol Scavenger Battle!

22.TitleEnglish: La Pool de Prance The Great Race!

23.SummaryEnglish: Mimiko Jigoku returns and reveals that her dream was to become an idol. She enters PriPara for the first time and has her debut live. Afterwards, Yui and Laala also performs and congratulates Mimiko on her debut performance.

29.SummaryEnglish: The third Idol Time Grand Prix is coming up, Yui, Nino, Miichiru, and Shuka all work their hardest to prepare for it. However, Shuka asked Mimiko Jigoku to help her train until she is 100% perfect for the grand prix. Shuka had almost been disqualified due to her lateness. But luckily, she arrived safely and won the third idol time grand prix.

35.TitleEnglish: Close Encounters of the Michiru Kind
35.SummaryEnglish: Another important factor to wake up Falala is, a dream. But Michiru could not remember her dream. Michiru can't join the team of Yui if she stay like this, and she won't feel as if she can become a force to help Falala, it will be depressed. Meanwhile, Michiru seems to hold a hint of her dream.

36.TitleEnglish: Big Pinch in Dream Eye Camp

37.SummaryEnglish: The 4th Grand Prix was held with the acquisition of Coord at the last time given to the winner. Shuka once again showed off her live performance to show the difference in ability to Yui, and show the previous rank of the champion. Meanwhile, MY☆DREAM burns to the end to overwork with the results of their special training camp. However, MY☆DREAM had fallen into a situation where entry into the Grand Prix could not be done for some reason.

39.TitleEnglish: The End of the Year! It's Bava Great Cleaning Time!
39.SummaryEnglish: Now the year is coming to an end, the Avocado Academy is undergoing extensive cleaning. Everyone gathers together and hoppers are applied to the students. Yui was also struggling to clean up, but in the middle she finds old sunglasses. Apparently this sunglasses seems to be an important item for solving problems of Farara and Garara.

46.TitleEnglish: Traversing Time and Space MY DREAM!

47.SummaryEnglish: After Pakku eats the Time Tower, he starts to destroy Paparajuku Pripara. Yui, Michiru, Nino, Laala, Garara, Falala, and Shuka all try to stop him but efforts are useless. Then, Pakku attempts to eat Yui's plentiful dreams when Laala sacrifices herself for Yui's dream and gets eaten instead. Inside Pakku's body, Laala attempts to protect her own dream from being swallowed and performs in there, resulting in Pakku freezing. But as a price, Laala falls asleep in Pakku.

48.SummaryEnglish: Laala is eaten and falls asleep inside a frozen Pakku. As Yui and the others are panicking, Mirei, Sophy and the other Parajuku idols have come to use the power of the performance to wake Laala up.

49.TitleEnglish: The Birth of a Divine Idol!?

50.TitleEnglish: Fly With the Wings of Dreams, MY DREAM!

51.TitleEnglish: Everyone Gather Together! It's Time to Become an Idol!
